name: abbi1dv
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), c0))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cab(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), c0))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cab(s0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cab(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

comment: Deduction from a wff to a class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jul-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Nov-2019.)
